elements.name: On the "Multiclass" page, Class and Section textBoxes, along with a Search button,
elements.description:
should be visible to search among the students in the school, and the students should be searchable
  based on the provided criteria.

steps.name: The user goes to the "loginUrl" address
The user clicks on the admin login tab
The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser
The user enters "adminUsername_dgn" into the username textbox
The user enters "password_dgn" into the password textbox
The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the admin page
The user clicks on the Student Information link in the admin panel's sidebar
The user clicks on the Multi Class Student link in the opened dropdown menu
The user verifies that the Class and Section textboxes are visible on the opened page
The user clicks on the Class textbox and selects the ""Class 2"" tab from the opened dropdown menu
The user clicks on the Section textbox and selects the ""A"" tab from the opened dropdown menu
The user confirms that a colored circle is spinning on the user icon or that a color transition is visible at the top of the page, indicating that the search has been performed.

name: As an administrator (admin), I want a page where I can view multi-class students and perform actions like adding or removing students from multi-class.
